# Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Scope

- [ ] Runtime auth/setup/docs
- [ ] Notebook behavior (`notebooks/*.ipynb`)
- [ ] Python module updates (`src/*.py`)
- [ ] CI/workflow or governance updates

## Checklist

- [ ] I ran `python -m pip install -r requirements-ci.txt`
- [ ] I ran `bash scripts/smoke_local.sh`
- [ ] I ran `pre-commit run --all-files` (or equivalent lint checks)
- [ ] I updated README/docs/changelog as needed
- [ ] No credentials, tokens, or `.env` secrets are included
